• 100-card ready-to-play Adventures in the Forgotten Realms (AFR) Commander deck

DESCRIPTION:
The Draconic Rage Adventures in the Forgotten Realms Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil etched Display Commander, 10 double-sided tokens, 1 life tracker, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), and 1 reference card, all in reduced-plastic packaging.
